original_title: Weekly fuel quota to be increased
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The national fuel pass QR system allocated fuel quotas will be increased.

Taking to Twitter Minister of Power and Energy Kanchana Wijesekera said registered taxi three-wheelers will receive 22 liters per week, while other three-wheelers and motorbikes will receive 14 liters per week.
He added that cars will receive a quota of 40 liters per week.
The increased new fuel quotas will be made available from midnight Tuesday (30).
